Line1.541E6: A great and terrible beast. It has plagued the Steppes all season, laying waste to crops, caravans, and warriors alike.
Line3.541E6: Bring me its head as an offering to our ancestors. Then, we may call you Oxen Tribe.
Line7.541E6: I will wait here for you to return... or until the sun rises again.
Line9.BAE4.Bar: You will not be waiting long.
VoiceDir1.541E6: Only slighly somber. Such threats are common in the Steppes.
VoiceDir9.BAE4.Bar: Confident. Ready. Heading inside the cave.
